q0.question: who is lloyd duffy?
q0.recall: Lloyd Duffy is Danny's geeky friend who lives next door with his uncle Herb and aunt May. He is also the one who grows fruits with an experimental growth accelerator and helps Danny with the machine that turns him into a grown man. Later, he works on a machine with the opposite effect to help Danny return to his 14-year-old body. He also turns himself into an apparently middle-aged professor named Mr. Lloyd and starts working at the same high school as a teacher.
q0.vectordb: Lloyd Duffy is a character in a movie or TV show. There is not enough information to determine who he is outside of the context of the story.
q0.hybrid: Lloyd Duffy is Danny's geeky friend who lives next door with his uncle Herb and aunt May. He is also the one who grows fruits with an experimental growth accelerator and helps Danny with the machine that turns him into a grown man. Later, he works on a machine with the opposite effect to help Danny return to his 14-year-old body. He also turns himself into an apparently middle-aged professor named Mr. Lloyd and starts working at the same high school as a teacher.

q1.recall: Roy Kelton is the cold-tempered and vicious gym teacher who is engaged to Miss Peggy Noble, the teacher that Danny is in love with.

q6.question: how old did peggy turn herself into?

q7.question: who is miss peggy noble?
q7.recall: Miss Peggy Noble is a teacher who is madly in love with her student, 14-year-old Danny O'Neil. She uses a machine to turn herself into a 14-year-old so she can be with him.
q7.vectordb: Miss Peggy Noble is a character in a movie, played by Daphne Ashbrook. She is a teacher who is engaged to the gym teacher, Roy Kelton. She falls in love with the protagonist, Danny O'Neil, who is transformed into a 14-year-old boy.
q7.hybrid: Miss Peggy Noble is a character in a movie, played by Daphne Ashbrook. She is a teacher who is engaged to the gym teacher, Roy Kelton. She falls in love with the protagonist, Danny O'Neil, who is transformed into a 14-year-old boy.
